document_data.name: ''Cubic gate''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cubic gates''''' were legendary magical devices of planar travel, allowing users to create [[portal|gate]]s to a set of five different [[planes of existence]] and the [[Prime Material]].
document_data.Description: As their name implied, ''cubic gates'' were small cubes. They measured roughly {{SI|3|in|long=yes}} across, were fashioned from [[carnelian]], and radiated a palpable [[dweomer]].
document_data.Powers:
Each side of a ''cubic gate'' was keyed to a specific plane, though one of the six would always be keyed to the Prime Material plane. The selection of planes each side was keyed to would be purposely selected during a ''cubic gate's'' creation. When a side of a cube was pressed upon once, a gate would open to a random point on its keyed plane, whilst pressing upon it a second time would then close the gate. There could never be more than one gate opened at a time and, much like the ''[[gate]]'' [[spell]], the gates a ''cubic gate'' created were two-way and thus always had a small chance of something coming through from their other side.

Pressing a side of a ''cubic gate'' twice in quick succession would instead cause an effect similar to the ''[[plane shift]]'' spell, opening a gate that forcefully pulled in the side-presser and all other creatures within a {{SIAdj|5|ft|long=yes}} radius.

Following the [[Second Sundering]], ''cubic gates'' could only be activated three times per day.

Variants.''The Cube of Location a.k.a. Transformi: A ''cubic gate'' that was modified by [[Damien Nuren]]. It was keyed solely to the [[Shadow Plane]] and was also designed to transform nearby creatures into either a [[shade]] or [[shadow]], but while the gate opened, the transformation function failed to work when tested.<ref>

document_data.Notable Owners:
* These were among the magical items commonly used by [[planewalker]]s and could be purchased in the markets of [[Sigil]] at prices lower than those on the Prime Material.
* [[Ahghairon]], a powerful mage of [[Waterdeep]], owned a ''cubic gate''.<ref>{{Cite adventurers league/The Tower of Ahghairon|4,10}} His was created by the wizard [[Hilather]] and covered on each of its sides in [[Alzhedo]] characters. In addition to the Prime Material plane, the ''cubic gate's'' sides were keyed to [[Arborea]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]], the [[Far Realm]], the [[Nine Hells]], and the [[Outlands]].<ref>{{Cite adventurers league/The Tower of Ahghairon|13,18}}
* On the Isle of [[Evermeet]], the fourth floor display room housed a ''cubic gate'' that was considered to be an antique by the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref>
* Mordeia the Great, a famed planewalker.<ref>
